title: An Anick type wild automorphism of free Poisson algebras
abstract:
We construct an Anick type wild automorphism $\delta$ in a 3-generated free
Poisson algebra which induces a tame automorphism in a 3-generated polynomial
algebra. We also show that $\delta$ is stably tame.
  Dedicated to the memory of professor V.A.Roman'kov
